00019 /*!
00020  * \file
00021  * \author Russell Bryant <russell@digium.com>
00022  * \brief Generic event system
00023  */
00024 
00025 #ifndef AST_EVENT_DEFS_H
00026 #define AST_EVENT_DEFS_H
00027 
00028 /*! \brief Event types
00029  * \note These values can *never* change. */
00030 enum ast_event_type {
00031    /*! Reserved to provide the ability to subscribe to all events.  A specific
00032        event should never have a payload of 0. */
00033    AST_EVENT_ALL    = 0x00,
00034    /*! This event type is reserved for use by third-party modules to create
00035        custom events without having to modify this file. 
00036        \note There are no "custom" IE types, because IEs only have to be
00037        unique to the event itself, not necessarily across all events. */
00038    AST_EVENT_CUSTOM = 0x01,
00039    /*! Voicemail message waiting indication */
00040    AST_EVENT_MWI    = 0x02,
00041    /*! Someone has subscribed to events */
00042    AST_EVENT_SUB    = 0x03,
00043    /*! Someone has unsubscribed from events */
00044    AST_EVENT_UNSUB  = 0x04,
00045    /*! Number of event types.  This should be the last event type + 1 */
00046    AST_EVENT_TOTAL  = 0x05,
00047 };
00048 
00049 /*! \brief Event Information Element types */
00050 enum ast_event_ie_type {
00051    /*! Used to terminate the arguments to event functions */
00052    AST_EVENT_IE_END       = -1,
00053 
00054    /*! 
00055     * \brief Number of new messages
00056     * Used by: AST_EVENT_MWI 
00057     * Payload type: UINT
00058     */
00059    AST_EVENT_IE_NEWMSGS   = 0x01,
00060    /*! 
00061     * \brief Number of
00062     * Used by: AST_EVENT_MWI 
00063     * Payload type: UINT
00064     */
00065    AST_EVENT_IE_OLDMSGS   = 0x02,
00066    /*! 
00067     * \brief Mailbox name (mailbox[@context])
00068     * Used by: AST_EVENT_MWI 
00069     * Payload type: STR
00070     */
00071    AST_EVENT_IE_MAILBOX   = 0x03,
00072    /*! 
00073     * \brief Unique ID
00074     * Used by: AST_EVENT_SUB, AST_EVENT_UNSUB
00075     * Payload type: UINT
00076     */
00077    AST_EVENT_IE_UNIQUEID  = 0x04,
00078    /*! 
00079     * \brief Event type 
00080     * Used by: AST_EVENT_SUB, AST_EVENT_UNSUB
00081     * Payload type: UINT
00082     */
00083    AST_EVENT_IE_EVENTTYPE = 0x05,
00084    /*!
00085     * \brief Hint that someone cares than an IE exists
00086     * Used by: AST_EVENT_SUB
00087     * Payload type: UINT (ast_event_ie_type)
00088     */
00089    AST_EVENT_IE_EXISTS    = 0x06,
00090 };
00091 
00092 /*!
00093  * \brief Payload types for event information elements
00094  */
00095 enum ast_event_ie_pltype {
00096    /*! Just check if it exists, not the value */
00097    AST_EVENT_IE_PLTYPE_EXISTS,
00098    /*! Unsigned Integer (Can be used for signed, too ...) */
00099    AST_EVENT_IE_PLTYPE_UINT,
00100    /*! String */
00101    AST_EVENT_IE_PLTYPE_STR,
00102 };
00103 
00104 /*!
00105  * \brief Results for checking for subscribers
00106  *
00107  * \ref ast_event_check_subscriber()
00108  */
00109 enum ast_event_subscriber_res {
00110    /*! No subscribers exist */
00111    AST_EVENT_SUB_NONE,
00112    /*! At least one subscriber exists */
00113    AST_EVENT_SUB_EXISTS,
00114 };
00115 
00116 struct ast_event;
00117 struct ast_event_ie;
00118 struct ast_event_sub;
00119 
00120 #endif /* AST_EVENT_DEFS_H */
